channel.title: LOGiN for others problems... plz help
channel.description:
hi,
i'm making a server and i'm now so far that i can make myself owner and change the whole server. but i got 1 problem... when somebody on another pc tries to login it says connection error.. how do i fix this??
thank you
--- soldier007 ---[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2008, 09:12:27 AM[/size][hr]anybody knows?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2008, 11:09:49 AM[/size][hr]does nobody knows?
